Dialogs.Text: MsMaki95: Hey, do you need any help?
LostDecipher2: Now that you mention it, there is something i need to know.
LostDecipher2: What have you tried to do to restore the picture?
MsMaki95: Honestly, not a lot, we tried to modify the object with admin commands, but we avoided doing direct modifications or... Well, hacker things and such. u-u
LostDecipher2: With 'Hacker things' you mean hacking the server, right?
MsMaki95: Yeah, Jack was really strict with that since this place well... Look how it is now. o-o So we just tried poke with the things working in this room.
LostDecipher2: So, regarding this picture, you just touched things in this room?
MsMaki95: Yep, that means we can explore so much more. And well, it's not all bad news, since we can discover more things still. -v-
LostDecipher2: I see, thanks for the help.
MsMaki95: Oh, i didn't do anything but, you are welcome! >-o
Thomas B: (So they only tested things in this room. I wonder if somewhere else in the chat is something related to this picture.)
